target: Lord Vader (Maul, Royal Guard, Darth Vader, Thrawn)
notes: High relics required. JKL’s stun helps manage Maul. GAS needed for durability.

target: Jedi Master Kenobi (CAT, General Kenobi, Ahsoka, Padmé, Barriss)
notes: Keep SEE alive until ultimate. Wat’s tech is critical. Works best if JMK doesn’t have CAT.

target: Jedi Master Luke (JKR, JKL, Hoda, Shaak Ti)
notes: SEE must reach ultimate to win. Use Armor’s Beskar buff to survive JML’s opening.

target: Supreme Leader Kylo Ren (Hux, SiT, Malak, Daka)
counter: Jedi Master Luke (JKR, JKL, GAS, Hoda)
notes: Control with JKL stuns. GAS and JKR add durability. Beware of Kylo ultimate timing.

counter: Jabba the Hutt (Krrsantan, Boushh, Skiff Lando, Embo)
notes: Jabba with Boushh burns through Rey comps. Watch for Ben Solo’s mechanics.
